doc.field: Includes a photo of HRL with John Cowles and Ben Reese at a TIME's Press Party; HRL speaking at a TIME ad sales convention; group shots with HRL taken during his trip to the Near East; multiple photos of HRL with Governor J. Strom Thurmond and Jean Crouch in front of the Governor's mansion in Columbia, South Carolina; HRL's granddaughter Lila Luce as a toddler holding an issue of TIME; HRL with Christie Bennett and George A. Buchanan Jr.; an original signed letter from Bill Howland regarding HRL's trip to Columbia, SC; HRL in a tuxedo conversing with individuals at the reception for Chilean President Gabriel Gonz√°lez Videla; HRL with Kenneth Parker; HRL with Phillip Reed and Sir William Rootes visiting an auto show; HRL with W. E. Knox; HRL presenting President Harry S. Truman with a portrait which appeared on the cover of TIME; shots from HRL's trip to Iran; and HRL walking near an Orthodox church?
